overview: From 2025-09-07 to 2025-09-08, ethereum-optimism/optimism had 3 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 6 active contributors.

topPRs.title: prestate-check: Add support for kona
topPRs.author: ajsutton
topPRs.body:
**Description**

Adds support for kona prestates to the prestate-check file.

* The prestate needs to be in the standard prestates list as `cannon-kona` type.
* The superchain-registry config is loaded by identifying the commit used by the kona submodule and then applying the op-geth conversion process to that commit
* The "EL commit" info is left blank because kona doesn't depend on op-reth in the same way that op-program depends on op-geth - kona just pulls in specific crates from reth and they don't necessarily all come from the same commit.

**Tests**

Tested manually.

**Additional context**

Depends on https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/op-geth/pull/673

**Metadata**

Fixes https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/issues/17284

topPRs.title: op-challenger: Add cannon-kona trace support
topPRs.author: ajsutton
topPRs.body:
**Description**

Based on https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/pull/17249 plus:
* Merging latest develop to fix kurtosis tests
* Add env vars to challenger docker build to setup kona-host as the server for cannon-kona games (and set asterisc-server to op-program which was previously missed)
* Add cannon-kona to default list of games to play
which is added in commit e77c664688d1ed1ff15a37d8082fd21d8cdedf46 plus test fixes in https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/pull/17356/commits/150a88e6330164b5a68b4b00c61132ca3c9ff1c7

topPRs.title: perf(supervisor): optimize client rotation for single-client case
topPRs.author: DenseDenise
topPRs.body:
When only one sync client is configured, we can skip the modulo operation and directly set the client index to 0. This avoids unnecessary arithmetic in the common single-client deployment scenario.

Maintains the same behavior while reducing CPU overhead in the hot path of client rotation.

topPRs.title: Tighten directory permissions for file-backed KV store
topPRs.author: sashaodessa
topPRs.body:
### Description
- **What**: Use `0700` instead of `0777` when auto-creating the KV store directory in `op-program/host/kvstore/file.go`.
- **Why**: Principle of least privilege; avoids world-writable or world-readable dirs depending on `umask`. Security hardening with no functional change for single-process usage.
- **Change**: `os.MkdirAll(dir, 0777)` â†’ `os.MkdirAll(dir, 0700)`.
- **Impact**: Should be transparent for typical deployments. If other users/processes previously relied on wider permissions, they may need explicit access.
